Event.Text:
Reed grabbed a few bottles of our strongest clear spirits, emptying one and filling it with water, giggling incessently to himself. He explained that they will challenge all the other rover occupants into a chugging match, wait until they are all unconcious, and loot all of their alcohol.
Not 5 minutes later, the rover door swings open, and Reed falls to the ground with a blood covered face. Guess Reed needed to work on his drunken impression.
